item.title: First-Time Grandpas Struggle to Put Toddler Down for a Nap Has Internet Cracking Up
item.description: TikTokers are cracking up at a viral clip of a grandfather having a heck of a time putting his granddaughter down for a nap. Source: TikTok | @kelsea_bowersmithThere's countless memes that call out how once strict parents, for some reason, melt into the palms of the hands of their own children: i.e. the "Grandparent Effect" which is often lampooned as being a double-standard, especially for folks who had to grow up in households that followed strict rules.

item.title: Missing Schoolgirls: Dramatic Photos Of Chibok Girls Who Escaped From Boko Haram
item.description: It's been over three weeks since more than 200 girls were abducted by Boko Haram from Government Girls’ Secondary School, in Chibok, Borno and they yet to be released. Some of the girls who escaped The abduction of the girls has raised a lot of controversies as some people have been asking for the names of those who were kidnapped and photos of those who escaped. Some, like Asari Dokubo have even insinuated that it's all a scam and no girl was kidnapped.

item.title: What Is Chris Pratt's Religion? Details on His Faith
item.description: Chris Pratt Has Made It Clear That His Religion Does Not Define HimBy Rebecca MacateeUpdated June 29 2022, 4:53 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesIt goes without saying at this point that Chris Pratt is one of the biggest stars in Hollywood. It seems as though the actor can't go more than a few months without appearing in another blockbuster film, and with due reason. Thanks to hit projects such as Jurassic World and Marvel's Avengers, Chris is a household name in more ways than one.

item.title: A Girlfriend Surprises Her Boyfriend With a Puppy on TikTok, but There's a Twist
item.description: A girlfriend on TikTok surprises her boyfriend with a new puppy on TikTok, but the heartwarming story has an unexpected twist ending. One of the hallmark signs of a loving relationship is being able to anticipate your lover's wishes and wants. This is by no means a hard and fast rule, but it's usually a good sign when you're able to surprise your romantic partner with something that you know will make them happy.

item.title: David Murathe Says He's Not Interested in Jubilee Leadership Again: "My Job is Done"
item.description: - Some of the leaders have proposed a new face of the Jubilee Party especially having more positions occupied by the youth - Raphael Tuju said that President Uhuru Kenyatta is passionate about young people taking up the leadership of the party - In May 2021, Uhuru Kenyatta expressed his anger after Jubilee, where he serves as the party leader, lost three by-elections held in Rurii Ward, Juja and Bonchari constituencies

item.title: Venita Speaks On Number Of Times She Have S3x Yearly
item.description: Big Brother Naija ‘All-Stars’ housemate, Venita Akpofure, has disclosed she does not frequently engage in sexual intercourse. Naija News reports that the controversial reality TV star made the revelation on Tuesday during a chat with her fellow housemates, Kiddwaya, Seyi, and Adekunle. This comes a few days after her colleague, Ike Onyema, said he pimps BBNaija girls to his friends, including Venita. Venita is yet to respond to the accusation, as Ike made the statement during a conversation with Whitemoney and Cross.

item.title: Gunmen Abandon N34m, Four Vehicles, Two Motorcycles
item.description: The Edo Police Command has said it has recovered over N34 million, four vehicles and two motorcycles from the scene of the bank robbery in Uromi, Esan North-East Local Government Area of the state. Naija News had reported that dare-devil armed robbers stormed three banks in the community and killed eight persons made up of two policemen and six civilians. In a statement on Friday night issued by the state Police Spokesman, Kontongs Bello said the cash and the vehicles were abandoned a few metres from the scene of the robberies.

item.title: Lexi Walker - Age, Family, Bio
Olisa Metuh Attempts To Eat Statement He Made To EFCC
item.description: The detained National Publicity Secretary of the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP,  Olisa Metuh, has reportedly torn a statement he made to the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, (EFCC), concerning his alleged involvement in the $2,1billion arms fraud. Only yesterday Olisa Metuh, who has been in detention since Tuesday last week, admitted to receiving N400m from the office of the National Security Adviser, Sambo Dasuki, and agreed to make public all the assignments he did for Nigeria’s past president, Goodluck Jonathan.

item.title: Who Is L.C. on 'Claim to Fame'? We Think We Know
item.description: Who Is L.C. on 'Claim to Fame'? According to Her, She's 5.679% Whitney Houston!By Jennifer TisdaleSep. 6 2022, Updated 2:00 p.m. ET Source: ABC"L.C." Warning: This article contains spoilers for Season 1 of Claim to Fame. Someone finally took nepotism and made it into a game show! Claim to Fame is ABC's version of "I'm with the DJ," except the DJ could be a famous actor, musician, or athlete. On the show, 12 contestants have been picked to live in a house because they're related to a celebrity.

item.title: Halleemah Nash Reacts to JJ Redick's N-Word Rebuttal
item.description: Halleemah Nash Reacts to Lakers Coach JJ Redick Saying He "Never" Called Her the N-WordA spokesperson for JJ Redick said him calling Halleemah Nash the N-word "never happened." By Elizabeth RandolphPublished June 27 2024, 10:39 a.m. ET Source: Instagram/@halleemah, Getty ImagesContent warning: This article contains mentions of the N-word and racial discrimination. Newly appointed Los Angeles Lakers coach JJ Redick is in hot water after author and speaker Halleemah Nash accused the sports professional of calling her the N-word.

item.title: Thomas Mller - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: German forward who joined Bayern Munich in 2008 and became a member of the German national team in 2010. He won the Golden Boot at the 2010 World Cup after scoring five goals in six games while leading Germany to third place in the tournament. He then helped lead Germany to a World Cup Championship in 2014, netting another five goals along the way.  Before Fame He began his youth career with TSV Pahl in 1993, then joined the Bayern Munich youth team in 2000.

item.title: We Didn't Give Contract To Tompolo, But A Company
item.description: The federal government of Nigeria on Tuesday said the pipeline surveillance contract was not awarded directly to former Niger Delta militant leader, Government Ekpemupolo popularly known as Tompolo. The Group Chief Executive Officer of the Nigerian National Petroleum Company Limited (NNPCL) Mele Kyari who made this known on Tuesday explained that the contract was given to corporate entities. He however explained that Tompolo has interests in the company that was awarded the contract.

item.title: Wizkid Sparks Reactions As He Reveals Relationship Status
item.description: Nigerian singer, Ayo Balogun, popularly known as Wizkid, has disclosed his relationship status for the umpteenth time. Naija News reports that Wizkid who welcomed a second child with his manager cum baby mama, Jada Pollock, said he is single. The singer in a post shared on Snapchat said he has been single for a long time and might probably get one or two people. He wrote: “Been single for so long, gotta find me one or 2″

item.title: Corey Kluber - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: MLB pitcher who won the American League Cy Young Award with the Cleveland Indians in both 2014 and 2017. He helped the Indians reach the 2016 World Series where they were defeated by the Chicago Cubs in seven games. Before Fame He played college baseball at Stetson University. His junior year, he went 12-2 with a 2.05 ERA and he was named Atlantic Sun Conference Pitcher of the Year. Trivia He was a fourth round pick of the San Diego Padres in 2007.

item.title: Despite My Husband's Health Challenges I Still Love Him, But Love In A Different Way
item.description: The esteemed Nollywood actress, Joke Silva and her husband, Olu Jacobs, have consistently been hailed as a ‘Power Couple,’ earning admiration and applause from numerous entertainers and fans. They are lauded for exemplifying positive and commendable qualities as a celebrity couple. However, as the years have passed, concerns about the veteran actor Olu Jacobs’ health and rumours of his demise have surfaced. Olu Jacobs, a trailblazer among the first Nigerian actors to feature in Hollywood/American productions like ‘Ashanti,’ has been the subject of speculations regarding his well-being.

item.title: EFCC Agents Storm PDP Primary Election Venue
item.description: Officers of the Economic Financial Crime Commission (EFCC) on Saturday stormed the MKO Abiola International Stadium, Abuja, the venue of the Peoples Democratic Party presidential primary election. The officers of the anti-graft agency arrived at the venue around 4:4opm but the purpose of their visit is unknown. The likes of Vice President, Abubakar Atiku; two former Senate Presidents, Bukola Saraki and Anyim Pius Anyim; Governors Aminu Tambuwal (Sokoto); Nyesom Wike (Rivers); Bala Mohammed (Bauchi); Emmanuel Udom (Akwa Ibom); former governor of Ekiti State, Ayo Fayose; Sam Ohunabunwa, and Dele Momodu are contesting for the presidential ticket of the party.

item.description: Who is the new stew on 'Below Deck'? Following the exit of third stew Jessica Albert, the crew of 'My Seanna' needed a replacement ASAP. Details. While many crew members have either quit or been fired on Below Deck over the years, one Season 9 departure threw the entire team on My Seanna for a loop. After days of expressing her discontentment regarding her job, her boss, and her workload, third stew Jessica Albert packed her bags during the ninth episode ("

item.title: Eoin Macken - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Irish actor and model known for his role as Dr. TC Callahan in the TV series The Night Shift from 2014-2017. His film credits include Resident Evil: The Final Chapter, The Forest and Centurion. Before Fame He began finding work as a model in 2003, completing campaigns for Ralph Lauren, GQ, and Abercombie and Fitch. Trivia He had his breakout television role as Sir Gwaine on the BBC series, Merlin. Family Life He has a sister named Freya as well as three half-siblings.

item.title: Governor Wike fires Rivers state health commissioner
item.description: Rivers state governor, Nyesom Ezenwo Wike has taken a major decision The governor relieved the state commissioner of health, Dr Theophilus Odagme of his appointment yesterday, February 15 No reason was given for the as decision The Rivers state governor, Nyesom Ezenwo Wike has relieved the state commissioner of health, Dr Theophilus Odagme of his appointment. Briefing journalists after the state executive council meeting on Wednesday, February 15 the state information commissioner, Dr Austin Tam-George noted that the governor wished the former commissioner well in his future endeavour.

item.title: You Are Not A President Of Social Media
item.description: Popular Yoruba movie star, Yomi Fabiyi has berated his colleague and president of the Theater Arts and Motion Picture Producers Association of Nigeria (TAMPAN), Bolaji Amusan popularly known as Mr Latin, over his recent remark on veteran actors. Naija News recalls that Mr Latin had earlier stated that ailing and struggling actors demanding help are not members of the association. The thespian explained that the actors don’t ask TAMPAN for help because they know they are not active members, hence the group cannot assist them.

item.title: 11 Types of Alcohol and the Kind of Drunk Theyll Make You Feel
item.description: Are you looking to get a specific kind of drunk tonight? Here are 11 types of alcohol and how drunk they'll make you feel. 1. Vodka: Text-People-You-Shouldn&#x2019;t-Be-Texting Drunk The deep feelings you have for people, good or bad, are all coming out with vodka. You are a piñata, vodka is Barry Bonds with an aluminum bat, and all of your insides will be spewing everywhere at some point. You’ll leave voicemails, send texts, make calls, say things to people’s faces, post stuff to social media, and somehow, in the moment, it’ll feel like such a good idea.

item.title: Andy Uba Fears Anambra People Because Of His Actions Under Obasanjo, Okija Shrine
item.description: The Chukwuma Soludo Gubernatorial Campaign has claimed that the candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in the November 6 election, Andy Uba, is afraid of his own shadow in the state and has been running from the people of Anambra State for weeks. Naija News reports that Soludo Campaign stated this in a statement issued in Awka on Thursday by C. Don Adinuba, the Communications Director of the Campaign who is also the Anambra State Commissioner for Information and Public Enlightenment.

item.title: 'Seinfeld' and 'Toy Story' Actress Estelle Harris Has Died at 93 Years Old
item.description: Estelle Harris, best known for her role as Mrs. Costanza on 'Seinfeld,' has passed away at 93 years old. What was her cause of death? Source: Getty ImagesEstelle Harris, best known for her roles as Mrs. Costanza on NBC's acclaimed sitcom Seinfeld and Mrs. Potato Head in the Toy Story franchise, has passed away. She was 93 years old. According to Estelle's son, Glen Harris, the Suite Life of Zack & Cody actress passed away on April 2, 2022.

item.description: The Nigeria U20 Women’s national team, Falconets, have been left stranded in Istanbul, Turkey, after crashing out of the ongoing FIFA U20 Women’s World Cup in Costa Rica. In photos shared by Soccernet, the two-time FIFA U20 Women’s World Cup finalists, who left Costa Rica on Monday, where captured sleeping on the bare floor and chairs at the Istanbul Airport after staying at a spot for 24 hours. item.description: Who wins 'Squid Game'? In the Netflix series, 456 contestants are pitted against one another to play deadly versions of children's games. Source: NetflixSpoiler Alert: This article contains spoilers for Season 1 of Squid Game. The premise of the Netflix original series, Squid Game, is the stuff of nightmares, and it has the potential to keep viewers thinking for quite some time once they watch all nine episodes. The South Korean drama focuses on a group of 456 people who are invited to compete in a series of children's games to win a prize of ₩45.

item.title: Who Did Alex Trebek Want to Replace Him? What He Said Before His Death
item.description: Alex Trebek Named Two People As Potential Replacements to Host 'Jeopardy!'By Joseph AllenUpdated Aug. 31 2021, 12:53 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesThe attempts to replace Alex Trebek as permanent host of Jeopardy! have not gone super well thus far. Mike Richards, a former executive producer on the show, was named the new host, but ultimately stepped down from the role just days after he was announced after allegations about his past behavior towards women were made public.

item.title: Alva Inga - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Influencer and model most well known for her alvainga Instagram account which has earned more than 330,000 followers. Before Fame Her first Instagram picture was from February of 2017. She used to do gymnastics, but has gravitated more towards fitness, tennis, and endurance training. Trivia She was a face for photographer Jay Tee. She could be seen on his Instagram account jay_tee_photo. Family Life Her parents helped manage her social media pages.

item.title: Iyabo Ojo Begins Plans To Give Mohbad Befitting Burial
item.description: Nollywood actress, Iyabo Ojo, has begun plans to give the late Nigerian singer, Ilerioluwa Olademeji Aloba, better known as Mohbad, a befitting burial. Naija News reports that the movie star made this known in a chat with an Instagram blogger while giving an update on the investigation of Mohbad’s death. Recall that the corpse of the late ‘KPK’ crooner was exhumed last week for autopsy by the Lagos State Police, following the controversy surrounding the death.

item.title: Machine Gun Kelly - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Born Colson Baker, but best known as Machine Gun Kelly or MGK, he gained fame with Stamp Of Approval in 2006 and became known for his spitfire lyrics. He won the MTV Breaking Woodie Award in 2012. He starred as Felix in the 2018 Netflix film Bird Box and played Tommy Lee in the 2019 Mötley Crüe biopic The Dirt.  Before Fame He lived in Egypt and Germany as a child because his parents were missionaries. He grew up listening to DMX and Ludacris.

item.title: D'banj Wins Big At The 2014 World Music Awards
item.description: Nigeria's own D''banj was honoured recently at the 2014 World Music Awards which occured on Tuesday 27th of May. The Oliver Twist crooner made his country proud by taking home the 'Best Selling African Artist' award at the event. Not only that but he also performed alongside Miley Cyrus, Mariah Carey, Flo Rider, DJ Khaled, Ricky Martin, Tinie Tempah, Leonah Lewis and more. The 2014 World Music Awards was held in Salle des Etoiles in Monte Carlo, Monaco and honours the best artistes from different regions of the world.

item.title: Mchanganuzi: Ruto anatumia ukabila katika kucheza siasa za Kibra
item.description: - DP Ruto anatumia kadi ya ukabila kwenye siasa za Kibra kulingana na mchanganuzi Manyora - Ruto amekuwa akimsakia kura Mariga kupitia mikutano na wapiga kura kutoka Kibra - Mariga anakabiliana na Imran Okoth wa ODM, Owalo wa ANC na wengine kwenye uchaguzi huo mdogo Naibu Rais William Ruto amechomoa kadi ya ukabili na ndiyo anatumia kusakia mgombea wa Jubilee McDonald Raila kura kwenye uchaguzi mdogo wa Kibra, mchanganuzi wa kisiasa Herman Manyora amesema.

item.title: Ryan Henry - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Chicago-based tattoo artist who became the protagonist of the VH1 reality series spin-off Black Ink Crew: Chicago. He is the owner of the tattoo shop 9Mag. Before Fame He opened his 9Mag shop in honor of his sister Nova and 10-month-old niece Ava, who were tragically murdered by Nova's ex-boyfriend Fredrick Goings in 2009. Trivia He searches for deeper meanings behind traditional Japanese tattoos because of his part-Japanese heritage. Family Life He was raised alongside his sister Nova.

item.title: They Do Not Have Votes For You
item.description: Governor of Rivers state Nyesom Wike has opened up on what he told the People’s Democratic Party presidential candidate Atiku Abubakar when he visited his home Wike warned Atiku to be careful of those around him as he explained that those people do not have any votes for him. He said that the Sokoto Governor, Aminu Tambuwal ought to have not spoken twice as it was a clear violation of the primaries’ guidelines.

For Season 8 of 90 Day Fiancé, it’s Stephanie Davison and her boyfriend, Ryan Carr.

item.title: Christina Evangeline - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Model who is best known as the wife of Saturday Night Live performer Kenan Thompson. The couple was married in November 2011 in Atlanta, Georgia. Before Fame She worked as a model and was rumored to be a professional escort. Trivia She held her wedding reception in the Arctic Room of the Georgia Aquarium. Family Life She gave birth to a girl named Georgia in June 2014 who weighed 6 and a half pounds at birth.

item.title: ElleCee Nelson - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: One of the youngest members of the popular family vlog channel Not Enough Nelsons that also included skits, challenges and more. The channel has earned more than 1.3 million subscribers. Before Fame The debut video of the channel was called "15 SIBLINGS?! I'M NO LONGER A PART OF THIS FAMILY!" Trivia She starred in a video called "BUYING ANYTHING ElleCee WANTS Challenge!" The video involved a birthday challenge for her to pick out all the toys she wants including multiple dolls.

item.title: Nigeria Central Bank Gov Opens Twitter Account, Speaks On Buying Three Private Jet
item.description: The Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), Godwin Emefiele has described as fake news reports that he purchased an aircraft for his 2023 presidential campaign. Reports had surfaced online on Wednesday claiming that the CBN governor purchased “three airplanes” to support his presidential campaign. The report also stated that individuals close to President Muhammadu Buhari had asked Emefiele to resign immediately. Reacting in a post on his new Twitter account, the CBN governor wrote: “Fake News”, accompanied with a screen shot of the report.

Before Fame He opened for Florida Georgia Line during their This is How We Roll Summer Series 2014. He had played well over 500 shows in years past.

item.title: These Examples of 'Rich Kid Syndrome' Will Make You Cringe
item.description: These Examples Of 'Rich Kid Syndrome' Make Everybody Else CringeBy Zachary BrennerUpdated Nov. 2 2018, 11:06 p.m. ET I grew up in Westchester County, New York which is one of the wealthiest counties in the United States. I saw a lot of kids who got cars the moment they turned sixteen, and people who got the newest cell phone the moment it became available. The truth is, of course, that most of these kids were not bad people.

item.title: Quavo Present As TakeOff Is Reportedly Killed In Texas Shooting
item.description: TakeOff of the Migos rap group has reportedly been shot dead in a shooting incident in Houston, Texas, United States. item.title: Is This the Last New Season of 'Gold Rush' We'll Ever See on TV?
item.description: It's hard to imagine that the popular Discovery channel show will ever get canceled, but is Season 10 the last 'Gold Rush' we will ever see? The prospectors on Discovery channel's Gold Rush have hit it big in more ways than one. Not only are they nailing some impressive gold hauls almost every mining season, but they're becoming household names and reality TV celebrities all over the country. Heck, when I was at a bar in Alaska filming for Ghost Hunters, I immediately recognized Parker Schnabel when he walked in.

item.title: BREAKING NEWS: Jonathan Ready To Grant Amnesty To Boko Haram Members
item.description: Information coming out from the Federal Capital Territory, FCT, Abuja, suggests that the Federal Government has indicated its willingness to grant amnesty for the Boko Haram insurgents. This piece of information was made public on Thursday, 29 May, 2014, by the Minister of Youth Development, Mr. Boni Haruna, while speaking at a programme to mark the nation’s Democracy Day titled ‘A day with young leaders of Nigeria’. According to the minister, President Goodluck Jonathan has given approval for the members of the Boko Haram sect to be given amnesty as soon as the terrorists lay down their arms.

item.title: MAUAJI ya kutisha yafanyika huku MUME akikatwa nyeti na Mpango wa Kando wa MKE
item.description: - Mwanamume wa Kijerumani alifariki kifo cha majuto akiwa mikononi mwa mkewe kutoka Kenya na mume ambaye ni mpenzi wake - Inasadikiwa 2 hao walipanga kummaliza wakati mwanamke huyo akiendelea na mahusiano na mume huyo wake wa kando - Mambo yalibadilika wakati mwanamke huyo alipomhusisha mpenzi wake na mauaji hayo baada ya polisi kufika katika eneo la tukio Mwanamke kutoka Kenya kwa jina la utani Black Widow anakabiliwa na mashtaka ya mauaji nchini Ujerumani baada ya kukamatwa kuhusiana na kupanga na kumuua mumewe.

item.title: Pep Guardiola, 20 Others In Man City Test Positive For COVID-19
item.description: English Premier League top club, Manchester City has recorded a major COVID-19 crisis. Reports made available on Thursday (today) confirmed that the club manager, Pep Guardiola and twenty other first-team members have tested positive for the dreaded disease and are now in isolation. Guardiola’s assistant, Juanma Lillo also tested positive for the viral disease, Naija News understands. Seven players of the club are said to be in isolation also ahead of Friday’s FA Cup tie at Swindon Town.

item.title: Raila awataka wabunge waliopatwa na virusi vya corona kujitokeza
item.description: - Raila amesema wabunge wanafaa kuweka wazi matokeo ya coronavirus ili kuzuia porojo - Alisema baadhi ya wabunge waliodaiwa kuwa na coronavirus hawana na huenda wapinzani wao wanaeneza taarifa za uongo - Aliwataka Wakenya kusaidiana wakati huu akisema serikali haitaweza kila kitu Kinara wa ODM Raila Odinga amewataka wabunge waliofanyiwa ukaguzi wa virusi vya coronavirus kuyaweka wazi kwa umma. Alisema si makosa ya mtu yeyote kupatwa na virusi hivyo na hakuna haja ya yeyote kuficha hali yake.

item.title: "They Were Just Circling the Parking Lot" Woman Complains About Uber Charging Wait Fee
item.description: In a social media video, a woman shared that an Uber charges wait fee after she looked at her receipt, and folks are not pleased. Details here. Source: TikTok/@pinatravelsCalling all Uber customers! Most folks would agree that they’ve minor issues with the rideshare company — from drivers not picking up people from their precise location to drivers canceling rides for no apparent reason. That said, many folks believe that Uber, like many rideshare companies, has a knack for squeezing in extra charges.

item.title: How the Chopped Judge Lost 40 Pounds
item.description: ‘Chopped’ Judge Maneet Chauhan was dedicated to inspiring her kids to make healthy choices. Now she says those choices are part of her everyday life. There’s a lot to love about Chopped (and Chopped Junior, of course). First and foremost, we love watching the chef’s faces when they open their baskets and are greeted with, say, calf eyeballs and candy canes. And, obviously, it’s always fun to see what wild concoctions the chefs come up with (like calf eyeball ice cream with a candy cane reduction).

item.title: Source Claims When PDP National Chairman, Ayu Would Step Down
item.description: The National Chairman of the Peoples Democratic Party, Iyorchia Ayu has been receiving calls in the past few months to resign from his position. The call became stronger after Atiku Abubakar emerged as the presidential candidate of the party, coming from the same region as the party chairman. Some aggrieved governors in the main opposition party have stood their ground that Ayu must go. A source that spoke with Vanguard, however, stated that the PDP National Chairman would not go until after the 2023 general elections.

item.title: Why Do Female Instagram Influencers Always Travel to Dubai?
item.description: If you're on social media, then you've come across Instagram models visiting beautiful destinations, including Dubai. Why are they always flown there? There's no denying that our world revolves around social media, so much so that millions worldwide are "doing social media" as a full-time career. Over the years, more and more young people have started becoming social media influencers, as they believe there's a chance for them to become a star, achieve fame, and make a lot of money.

COVID-19: Wagonjwa wengine 2 waaga dunia, 55 zaidi walazwa ICU
item.description: - Wizara ya Afya ilitangaza kuwa watu 280 waliambukizwa virusi vya corona katika saa 24 ziliopita - Jumla ya idadi ya sampuli zilizopimwa tangu kisa cha kwanza cha corona kiliporipotiwa nchini kenya imefika 1,278,200 - Wakati uo huo takwimu kutoka Wizara ya Afya zilionyesha kuwa wagonjwa 713 walipata nafuu na kuondoka hospitalini Watu 280 wameripotiwa kunasa virusi vya corona katika muda wa saa 24 zilizopita baada ya sampuli 4,919 kupimwa.

item.title: Wanandoa waliotoroka bila kulipa bili ya KSh140,200 hotelini wanasemekana kuwa na mwenendo wa kutoli
item.description: - Jamaa mmoja na mke wake wanasemekana kuishi katika hoteli ya kifahari ya Eka hapa jijini Nairobi kwa siku nane bila kulipa bili -Wanandoa hao, Roy Osano na Beth Muthoni wanasemekana kutumia zaidi ya KSh 140,200 na kuondoka bila kulipa chochote -Inasemekana wawili hao walipeana hundi ambayo haikuwa halali kwani hawakuwa na pesa kwenye akaunti zao za benki - Jambo la kushangaza ni kwamba hiyo sio mara ya kwanza kwa wachumba hao kufanya kitendo cha aina hiyo

item.title: Why Yoruba Now Suffer Untold Hardship
item.description: Aare Onakakanfo of Yorubaland, Iba Gani Adams, has advised Governors in the South-West Governors to embrace the Yoruba anthem in their activities, disclosing that only Osun and Ondo have adopted the rendition of the anthem in their state functions. Noting that there is evil in Yorubaland because the people have abandoned their cultural heritage, he called on Yoruba sons and daughters to go back to their roots in tackling the evils bedeviling the Yoruba race.

item.title: 'The Resident' Latest News and Updates
item.description: The medical drama The Resident follows the staff at Chastain Park Memorial Hospital as they juggle their work and the bureaucratic practices of the hospital industry. Starring Matt Czuchry as Dr. Conrad Hawkins, Emily VanCamp as Nic Nevin, and Manish Dayal as Dr. Devon Pravesh, and the show is filmed in Atlanta. Network: FOX First Episode Date: January 21, 2018 Cast: Matt Czuchry (Conrad Hawkins)Emily VanCamp (Nicolette "Nic" Nevin)Manish Dayal (Devon Pravesh)Shaunette Renée Wilson (Mina Okafor)Bruce Greenwood (Randolph Bell)Malcolm-Jamal Warner (Andre Jeremiah)Jane Leeves (Kit Voss)Morris Chestnut (Barrett Cain)Jessica Lucas (Billie Sutton)Where to Watch: FOX Now, Hulu

item.title: Fire Guts Kaduna Residence Of Sheikh Ahmad Gumi
item.description: The Kaduna residence of popular and controversial Islamic cleric, Sheikh Ahmad Gumi has been gut by fire. As of press time, the source of the fire couldn’t be established but efforts are ongoing to put out the inferno as seen in a video posted by the cleric on his Facebook page. He captioned the video; “To Allah we belong and to Him we shall return. Right now the house of Malam Sheikh Dr Ahmad Gumi is on fire right where Kulliyatul Banaat is.

item.title: Miranda Kerr - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Model, author, and entrepreneur who became the first Australian to pose as a Victoria's Secret Angel in 2007. She launched a brand of skincare products called Kora Organics and modeled for the chain store David Jones. Before Fame She grew up in the countryside riding dirt bikes and horses. She studied nutrition and health psychology before devoting herself to modeling. Trivia In 2007, she said that she meditates, chants, and practices yoga daily as part of her commitment to Buddhism.

item.title: Mombasa bishops jump to Ruto's defence on cash donations, urge him to give more
item.description: - The Pentecostal church bishops in Mombasa led by Paul Mwaura said those opposed to Ruto's donations were lost - The clergy men argued no one had gone to court to prove the DP's donations were proceeds of corrupt - The church leaders urged Ruto to continue supporting churches regardless of what other people thought about his source of wealth Bishops from the Pentecostal Church of Kenya in Mombasa have come out to defend Deputy President William Ruto’s generous contribution to church urging him to continue with the mission.

item.title: 18 Online Business Ideas To Seize In 2022
item.description: Today we no longer see digitization and dematerialization as a project for the future, but rather an emergency. The economy is undergoing a profound transformation and the process of creative destruction is clearly underway. According to eMarketer, online entrepreneurship is worth more than $ 2,000 trillion and continues to show double-digit growth. You will understand that going online is a great opportunity , provided you know how to find the right business idea . What I notice is that the majority of strategies for starting an online business have gathered dust and are not necessarily adapted to a changing world.

item.title: Chad Smith - Age, Family, Bio
Gov Makinde Sets To Join Another Party
item.description: Governor Seyi Makinde of Oyo State has allegedly concluded the plan to decamp from the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP to another party ahead of 2023 general elections. The development was confirmed to newsmen by a chieftain of the Nigeria opposition party who begged not to be mentioned to the public. According to the report monitored by Naija News on Daily Post, Makinde’s decision was stirred by disagreement with some top members of the party in Oyo.

item.title: Olujimi Condemns Fayose, May Dump PDP
item.description: The lawmaker representing Ekiti South senatorial district, Biodun Olujimi, has expressed the possibility of dumping the Peoples Democratic Party alongside her supporters. The governorship aspirant condemned the national leadership of the party over how it treated her faction in the build-up to the January 26 primary election of the party. Olujimi who spoke after meeting with her supporters on Monday disclosed that her team has set up a committee headed by a former acting governor of the state, Tunji Odeyemi, which would report back within three days.

item.title: Alec Bailey - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Talented vocalist and Vine sensation who got his start by posting song covers to YouTube. His playing career began with a group called the Southern Style Band. Before Fame He was 14 years old when he first began singing, writing, and playing guitar. Trivia His original song "Other Rivers" advanced two rounds in a national songwriting competition. Family Life He has posted several photos with his mother on his Instagram.

item.title: Anfisa Arkhipchenko - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Rocketed to fame in 2016 starring on the TLC reality series 90 Day Fiancé alongside her fiance Jorge Nava. Before Fame She and Jorge met through Facebook. The pair had a number of mutual friends and after a few messages, she responded to him. Trivia After her reality debut, she became incredibly popular on social media, earning more than 270,000 Instagram fans before her account was suspended. She launched a new account, anfisanava_, which has earned over 800,000 followers.

item.title: David Sacks - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Before founding and serving as CEO of a social networking service called Yammer, Inc., this successful entrepreneur was the COO of PayPal and established the genealogical research website Geni.com. Before Fame After graduating from Stanford University with a degree in economics and subsequently earning a law degree from the University of Chicago, he worked briefly as a consultant for McKinsey & Company. Trivia After establishing a production company called Room 9 Entertainment, he financed the 2005 Jason Reitman-directed film Thank You For Smoking.

item.title: Husband Of Popular Nollywood Actress Is Dead
item.description: Veteran Nollywood actress, Ebele Okaro, has lost her husband to death. Naija News reports that the thespian announced the demise of her husband in a post via her Instagram page on Saturday, 29, July. The 59-year-old actress shared a photo of the deceased with an emotional caption in Igbo language that reads ‘Adieu Ezigbu Dim’ (goodbye my good husband). Ebele also in the social media post, reminisced on the adorable virtues of her husband while he was still alive.

item.title: Meredith Duxbury's Makeup Routine Is Trending on TikTok, but Is It a Hit or Miss?
item.description: Meredith Duxbury's makeup routine on TikTok has sparked a trend with creators trying her signature steps. But, is it worth it? Source: TikTok/@meredithduxburyIn case you’ve been out of the loop, TikTok has become one of the most trend-forward social media hubs. Over the years, creators have been able to spread everything from dance challenges to food recipes, and cleaning hacks that have taken on a life of their own. As of late, beauty and fashion blogger Meredith Duxbury has been the talk of #BeautyTok, thanks to her unique take on foundation application.

item.title: A Woman With Heart Of Gold
item.description: Nigerian filmmaker and actress, Judy Austin has celebrated her mother on her birthday. Naija News reports that the actress via her Instagram on Friday, 7th June poured encomiums on her mother after sharing her photo in celebration of her special day. Listing the many things her mother is to her, the actress affirmed her love for her mother and prayed she continues to blossom in good health and long life. She wrote: “Happy beautiful birthday to the most beautiful woman in the world!

item.title: Adeleke Speaks On Emergence As Osun Governor-Elect
item.description: The governorship candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in the Osun State Governorship election, Senator Ademola Adeleke, has reacted to his emergence as the winner of the exercise. Recall that Adeleke was declared the winner of the June 16 poll by the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) on Sunday morning. The INEC returning officer for the Osun governorship poll, Prof Oluwatoyin Temitayo Ogundipe, made the declaration on Sunday morning. Adeleke defeated the incumbent governor of the state and governorship candidate of the All Progressives Congress, Gboyega Oyetola and thirteen other candidates to emerge victorious.

item.title: Breaking: Guinness World Record Verifies Hilda's Cookathon, Says She is New Record Holder for Cookin
item.description: The Guinness World Records has verified Hilda Baci as the new record holder for the longest cooking marathonIn a statement published on Tuesday, June 13, the body said it had verified the 100-hour cooking evidence submitted by HildaHilda, who is from Akwa Ibom state, has effectively taken the record from Lata Tondon, who cooked for 87 hours and 45 minutesNigeria's Hilda Baci is the new record holder for the longest cooking marathon, having cooked for 93 hours and 11 minutes.

item.title: Army To Fly Wounded Soldiers Abroad For Treatment
item.description: The Chief Of Army Staff, Lt. Gen Farouk Yahaya has promised that wounded Nigerian soldiers that need further treatment abroad to get better will be flown out accordingly. He made the promise during his visit to wounded officers and soldiers at the 44 Nigerian Army Reference Hospital in Kaduna on Thursday. Gen. Yahaya also used the opportunity to reiterate the Nigerian Army’s (NA) commitment to giving prompt attention to the medical needs of wounded officers and soldiers.

item.title: Audrey Marie Anderson - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actress and model who played Kim Brown on the CBS drama The Unit alongside Dennis Haysbert. She is best known for her roles on Arrow and The Walking Dead. Before Fame She appeared on an episode of Beverly Hills 90210. Trivia She played Jenny in the film Least Among Saints. Family Life She grew up in Texas, where she used to work as a model. Associated With She appeared in the film Moonlight Mile alongside Jake Gyllenhaal.

item.title: What Happened to American Idol's Mario Vzquez?
item.description: What Ever Happened to Mario Vázquez from 'American Idol'?Mario was an engaging performer to watch and easily found himself in the top 12 final contestants. By Sheridan SingletonPublished Aug. 9 2024, 5:09 p.m. ET Source: FOXWhen the series first premiered, American Idol quickly became a sensation across the country. The first season is, frankly, the most iconic, simply due to the fact that it felt brand new. It gave us Kelly Clarkson, who is a gift that has never stopped giving.

item.title: Where Is 'Walker: Independence' Filmed? (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: The central conflict of 'Walker: Independence' takes place in Independence, Texas. Was that where 'Walker: Independence' was actually filmed? Abigail Walker (Katherine McNamara) is determined to seek justice in Walker: Independence after she was forced to watch her husband's murder before her very eyes when they were journeying from Boston to Texas. She makes her way to the small town of Independence, Texas, resolute in her mission to find her husband's killer and make him pay for his crimes.

item.title: Court Sentences Two Police Officers, Three Others to Death For Kidnapping Cattle Trader
item.description: The Akwa Ibom High Court sitting in Ikot Ekpene local government area of the state has finished the hearing of the kidnapping case of an Uyo-based cattle dealerJustice Isangedighi disclosed why two policemen and three other accomplices were found guilty of kidnapping.Several states across Nigeria have enacted laws making kidnapping punishable by death sentence.PAY ATTENTION: Help us change more lives, join TUKO.co.ke’s Patreon programme The Akwa Ibom State High Court has sentenced two former police officers to death for kidnapping an Uyo-based cattle dealer, identified as Alhaji Muhammed Umar Barkindo.

item.title: Crystal Renay - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Model with Facet Studio who is best known for her marriage to singer-songwriter Ne-Yo. Before Fame She moved from Florida to Los Angeles, California. Trivia She hinted at the name of her and Ne-Yo's baby with a hashtag of #PrinceSJ on Instagram. Family Life She is of Italian, African-American and Spanish ancestry. In February 2016, she married Ne-Yo, who previously had two kids with Monyetta Shaw. She and Ne-Yo welcomed a son of their own named Shaffer Jr.

item.title: FG Gives Update On 2nd Niger Bridge Project And Launch
item.description: The federal government has announced that the 2nd Niger-bridge project would be ready for launch by the first quarter of 2024. The disclosure was made on Saturday by the acting federal controller of works in Anambra State, Seyi Martins, Naija News reports. Recall that President Muhammadu Buhari-led government through the minister of power, works and housing, Babatunde Fashola, announced in November 2016 that it awarded a sum of N206 billion to Julius Berger Construction Company for the completion of the 2nd Niger Bridge.

item.title: James Brown Reveals What Happened When He Was Locked Up In A Male Cell
item.description: Popular Nigerian cross-dresser James Brown has spoken on his experience when he was locked up in a male cell. Brown revealed his traumatic experience via an interview with Hip TV. He stated that one of the inmates had fallen in love with him by the third day. He said: “I went to prison for two months. They put me in a prison for only guys and it was pretty intense. When I got there, they gave me welcome beating.

item.title: Actress Tess Gourin Claims She Is Jack Nicholson's Daughter in "Nepo Baby" Essay
item.description: Actress Tess Gourin claims in a "nepo baby" essay that she is the illegitimate daughter of Jack Nicholson. Is this true? And who is Tess's mother? Source: Getty ImagesIn late 2022, the term "nepo baby" had a moment after New York Magazine revealed its epic December cover discussing this phenomenon. Dakota Johnson, Maya Hawke, Zoë Kravitz, and other celebrities with famous parents were pictured with their faces on babies' bodies. The cover, while cheeky, wasn’t necessarily out of line.

item.title: Kylian Mbappe Officially Informs PSG That He Is Leaving This Summer
item.description: The relationship between Kylian Mbappe and Paris Saint Germain seems to be close to being over as the Frenchman informed the French club of his plans to leave them this summer. Recall that Kylian Mbappe first joined PSG on loan from Monaco on August 31, 2017, and the French giants paid the sum of €180 million to make the deal permanent on July 1, 2018. Since then, the 2018 FIFA World Cup winner has been almost unstoppable in terms of scoring goals and winning the French Ligue 1.

item.title: What Happened to Tiger Woods's Leg? Why He Has a Scar
item.description: Tiger Woods's Scary Leg Scar Is the Result of a Severe Car Crash From 2021Tiger woods revealed his leg scars for the first time since a 2021 car crash. By Joseph AllenPublished July 23 2024, 11:33 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesAt the end of another disappointing season, Tiger Woods missed the cut at the Open Championship. Of course, Tiger's life is about more than which golf tournaments he qualifies for, which is why he was back on the golf course just a few days later following his son.

item.description: - Machakos University said reports indicating that it offers a degree in witchcraft are false - The university management said the information was malicious and the public should thus ignore it - Reports have been circulating on social media platforms indicating the university offers the bizarre degree PAY ATTENTION: Help us change more lives, join TUKO.co.ke’s Patreon programme Machakos University has denied claims that it is offering a Bachelors Degree in Witchcraft.

item.title: Rwanda yaripoti kifo cha kwanza kutokana na covid-19
item.description: Waziri wa Afya nchini Rwanda ametangaza kifo cha kwanza na visa vipya 11 vya maambukizi ya virusi vya COVID -19 Tangazo hili linajiri saa chache baada ya nchi hiyo kutangaza kulegezwa kwa baadhi ya masharti ikiwemo usafiri wa teksi na wahudumu wa boda boda kurejelea hali yao ya kawaida. Habari Nyingine: Wakili wa George Floyd aliyeuawa Marekani na polisi asema kifo chake kilipangwa Tayari mgonjwa huyo mwenye umri wa miaka 65 amezikwa kulingana na tamaduni za dini ya kiislamu punde alipoaga dunia.

item.title: See Probably The Heaviest Children In The World
item.description: A loving father is planning to sell his own kidney to raise money for his three morbidly-obese children in Gurjarat, India. Please, scroll down to see all the photographs! Two sisters Yogita Rameshbhai Nandwana, five, and Anisha, three, and their 18-month-old brother Harsh, are probably the heaviest children in the world. The kids are unable to walk and even breathe properly due to their incredible weight – 34kg, 48kg and 15kg respectively – and their poor father has nothing to do but to sell his own kidney to fund life-saving treatment.

item.title: WhosChaos - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Comedic web video star and gamer known for his gameplay videos, technology unboxings and memes. He is known for his YouTube channel and his Twitch streaming. He has more than 1.5 million subscribers. Before Fame He made his YouTube channel in 2011, but rebranded it for his personal gaming purposes in 2012. Before that, he was on a YouTube team of gameplay commentators called XFG Nation. Trivia He joined GoonSquad and was also a member of the team Phase.

item.title: Gavana Waititu abadilisha msimamo, aunga mkono handisheki na BBI
item.description: - Waititu ambaye anakabiliana na masaibu kila upande, amesema anaunga mkono BBI na handisheki - Masaibu ya kiongozi huyo yalianza baada ya kujitokeza kumpigia debe Ruto katika azma yake ya kuwania urais 2022 - Gavana huyo alizuiliwa na mahakama kuingia katika ofisi yake hadi kesi dhidi yake kuamuliwa - Waititu alishtakiwa pamoja na mkewe kwa kufuja KSh588 milioni za kaunti hiyo Gavana anayezingirwa na utata amebadalisha msimamo wake siku ya Jumapili, Novemba 17, kuhusu uhusiano wake na kundi la Tanga Tanga, baada ya kutangaza kuunga mkono handisheki.

item.title: How Tall Is the TLC Star?
item.description: How tall is Shauna Rae from TLC's 'I Am Shauna Rae'? Read for details on her height and the rare condition that stunted her growth. It seems like we’re introduced to a new reality star every day, but Shauna Rae is unlike any TV personality we’ve met before. The 23-year-old hails from Long Island, N.Y., where she lives with her mom, dad, and her half-sisters, Ryley and Morgan. Viewers were first introduced to Shauna and her family in January of 2022 when I Am Shauna Rae made its debut on TLC.

item.title: If You Don't Want 'The Luminaries' Ruined, Steer Clear of These Book Spoilers
item.description: If you can't wait to find out how 'The Luminaries' ends, then you may want to look at these book spoilers to satisfy your curiosity. Source: STARZ/YouTubeIf Netflix's Bridgerton is any indication, there are going to be tons of production studios and networks looking to period-era book IP's to produce the next show about dramatic scenarios re-enacted by folks wearing bloomer pants, corsets, and pounds of wool clothing to walk outside just so they could mail a letter.

item.title: 'Riverdale' Would Need a Solid Plot to Last Longer Than Five Seasons
item.description: Although Season 5 of 'Riverdale' just premiered and there are plenty of storylines to figure out, fans are wondering if there will be a Season 6. Source: CWUp until Season 5, Riverdale had given fans years of wild storylines, sometimes cringey dialogue, and couples that so many of us shipped right from the start. It's no surprise, then, that fans are already wondering if there will be a Season 6 or not.

item.title: Anakwenze Sends Message To Atiku, Wike, Others
item.description: A chieftain of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Dr. Nwachukwu Anakwenze, has condemned the internal crisis rocking the party which began after the conclusion of the presidential primaries. Naija News reports that the PDP has being in disarray after the primaries which produced former vice president Atiku Abubakar as the presidential candidate. However, Atiku’s victory did not sit well with Rivers state governor Nyesom Wike and his supporters as they insisted that there were some Irregularities which favored Atiku.

item.title: Mel Tillis - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Country music superstar responsible for such hits as "I Ain't Never," "Good Woman Blues," "Coca-Cola Cowboy," and many others. Before Fame He was in the United States Air Force and also worked on the railroad. His first hit was I'm Tired from 1957 for singer Webb Pierce. Trivia He also had a career in movies, appearing in W.W. and the Dixie Dancekings from 1975, The Villain from 1979, Smokey and the Bandit II from 1980, and The Cannonball Run from 1981.

item.title: Shangwe baada ya mke wa mhubiri kupata mtoto miaka 22 tangu kuolewa
item.description: Mhubiri moja nchini Nigeria ambaye amekuwa kwa ndoa kwa zaidi ya miaka 22 bila ya kupata mtoto anasherehekea kwa sasa baada ya Mungu kuyajibu maombi yake Nnaghe Itam na mkewe sasa wamekuwa gumzo kwenye mitandao ya kijamii baada ya kujaliwa mtoto wao wa kwanza miaka 22 wakiwa na subira kwenye ndoa. Wanandoa hao ambao wanaongoza kanisa la Faith Church (Salem Church) mjini Calabar, walijawa na kufuraha tele na kutangaza habari hizo njema kwa waumini wa kanisa hilo ambao pia walieneza ujumbe huo mitandaoni.

item.title: A Look at Sharon and Dennis Rocha
item.description: Laci Peterson's Parents: What to Know About Sharon and Dennis RochaSharon and Dennis divorced when Laci was little, but remained on good terms. By Jamie LeePublished Aug. 13 2024, 6:34 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesIf you were watching cable news back in 2003–'04, you likely remember that for a while, every night, Larry King devoted the full hour of his self-titled CNN talk show to covering the Laci Peterson case. item.title: Tinubu Cannot Resolve Ondo APC Crisis PDP
item.description: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in Ondo State has declared that President Bola Tinubu’s intervention was insufficient to end the ongoing political turmoil in the state. Naija News had earlier reported that to solve the political crisis, Tinubu met with the State House of Assembly leaders and the state’s APC leaders late Friday night in the State House in Abuja. The Publicity Secretary of the opposition party, Kennedy Peretei, characterized the meeting as window dressing and the impeachment of the Deputy Governor, Lucky Aiyedatiwa, has been suspended out of respect for his office.

item.title: A Nutritionist Says Pizza Is a Healthier Breakfast Than Most Cereal
item.description: We're all guilty of enjoying a slice of cold leftover pizza for breakfast. But is it a healthy choice? Source: iStockWe're all guilty of enjoying a slice of cold leftover pizza for breakfast. Or two. Maybe even three. And while we all feel guilty for indulging immediately after, it turns out that a slice of pizza could be a better and more nutritious breakfast than a bowl of cereal. Luckily it doesn't really matter what kind either.

item.title: After Losing To Adeleke, Aregbesola, Oyetola Factions Continue Exchange Of Words
item.description: The two factions of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in Osun State have continued to trade blames over the party’s situation in the south-western state. Naija News reports the candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Senator Ademola Adeleke recently won the Osun State governorship election, defeating incumbent Governor Gboyega Oyetola of the APC. Many political observers believe the crisis within the APC caused by the fight between the loyalists of the Governor and those of the Minister of Interior and former state Governor, Rauf Aregbesola is largely responsible for the development.

item.title: APC Reacts To Tinubu's Ministerial List
item.description: All Progressives Congress (APC) has reacted to the much-awaited ministerial nominees list of President Bola Tinubu that was read out on the floor of the Senate yesterday. The party’s National Publicity Secretary, Felix Morka, while fielding questions on Channels Television’s Politics Today on Thursday evening, said the list was evident that the President is determined to give his best in office. Morka, who acknowledged the delay in the submission of the list, said the President was taking time to carefully select his cabinet that will help him deliver on his mandate to Nigerians, Naija News gathered.

item.description: On Monday (today), the Chief Justice of Nigeria (CJN), Justice Olukayode Ariwoola, swore in no fewer than sixty-two new Senior Advocates of Nigeria (SAN). He said: “I would like to say that the rank of Senior Advocate of Nigeria comes with immense prestige, dignity and greater responsibilities as well.

item.description: Former Minister of Science, Technology and Innovation, Dr Ogbonnaya Onu has denied claims of endorsing Labour Party, LP, presidential candidate, Peter Obi ahead of the 2023 elections. He stated that he remains a loyal member of the All Progressives Congress, APC, and would never involve himself in any form of anti-party activities. In a statement released and signed on Wednesday, the APC stalwart described attempts to associate him with LP as mischievous, wicked and unfortunate.

item.title: Goodluck Jonathan Nominates Alison-Madueke As OPEC Secretary-General
item.description: President Goodluck Jonathan has nominated Minister of Petroleum Resources Diezani Alison-Madueke as secretary-general of the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC). This was made known Tuesday by Reuters. The proposal is said to be aimed at breaking the deadlock over the post created by opposing candidates from Iraq, Saudi Arabia and Iran. According to Daily Times Nigeria, the candidacy is likely to receive support within African countries in OPEC, as Nigeria is first, the most populous country in OPEC and second, plays important role in oil market producing 1,954 barrels per day.

item.title: Meet 28-year-old Nigerian engineer who invented, designer worlds first ever fuel rocket
item.description: The world is talking about 28-year-old talented young man, Shehu Saleh Balami. He is the inventor and designer of the world’s first ever solid fuel rocket. He was reported to have studied mechanical engineering from the Federal University of Technology (FUT) in Minna, Niger state and launched his fuel rocket in 2008. The launching took place in Kaduna. Balami has been involved in the making of rockets since the year 2000.

In another post, Hermes allayed the fears of his fans, assuring them that he was safe and fine.

'It's Just Simple' - Davido Reacts As Soludo Wins Anambra Election
item.description: Nigeria/international award-winning musician, David Adeleke, popularly known as Davido, has reacted to the just concluded Anambra governorship election. Naija News reports the candidate of the All Progressives Grand Alliance, Chukwuma Soludo, was declared the winner of the election by the Independent National Electoral Commission, INEC. Soludo, 61, polled 112,229 votes beating Ozigbo, who polled 53,807 votes, and Andy Uba of the All Progressives Congress who got 43,285 votes. While Ifeanyi Ubah of the Young Progressive Party came fourth with 21,261 votes.

item.title: APC More Organized, Says PDP Chieftain As He Dumps Opposition Camp In Gombe
item.description: The Gombe State chapter of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has lost a chieftain to the All Progressives Congress (APC) with thousands of his supporters. The politician, Dr Jamil Isyaku Gwamna, declared on Friday that the APC is more organized and hence would not tie himself to a poorly managed camp (referring to the PDP). Naija News reports that the Sardauna of Gombe announced his defection yesterday while interacting with reporters alongside thousand of his supporters.

item.title: Details Of Buhari's Meeting With El-rufai Emerge [Photos]
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari was on Tuesday briefed by Governor Nasir El-rufai of Kaduna State on the killing of innocent citizens in the state. The President received the governor and the Commissioner for Internal Security and Home Affairs, Samuel Aruwan, at the Presidential Villa in Abuja. Naija News reports that bandit terrorists over the weekend killed 38 people in Giwa Local Government Area of Kaduna State. In a statement by Aruwan on Sunday, the terrorists killed the victims during an attack on Kauran Fawa, Marke and Riheya villages in the council area.

item.title: Philadelphia Mayor Caught Eating Inside a Restaurant After Banning Indoor Dining
item.description: Mayor Who Banned Indoor Dining Was Caught Eating at a RestaurantBy Robin ZlotnickUpdated Sept. 2 2020, 1:45 p.m. ET Source: TwitterPhiladelphia Mayor Jim Kenney banned indoor dining in his city, which is definitely the right move considering we're still in the middle of a deadly pandemic. Unfortunately, restaurants in the area have struggled to stay afloat because of the ban, and when Kenney was seen eating inside a restaurant in Maryland, Philly-based chefs and residents went ballistic.

item.title: VIDEO: Governor Kayode Fayemi Makes Concession Speech On Fayose's Victory
item.description: Few hours after the candidate of the People’s Democratic Party, PDP, Mr. Ayodele Fayose, was declared by the Independent National Electoral Commission, INEC, as the winner of the June 21 governorship election in Ekiti State, western Nigeria, the incumbent governor, Kayode Fayemi has released a concession speech. It could be recalled that, according to results released by INEC, Mr Fayose had scored 203, 090 votes to beat the candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Mr Fayemi, who scored 120, 433.

item.title: Bus Conductor Beaten To Coma By Female Soldier
item.description: A bus conductor was reportedly beaten to coma yesterday, August 22 by a female Nigerian soldier over money at Iyana Isashi, along Lagos- Badagry expressway in Lagos State. The soldier who was dressed in mufti had boarded a bus at Mile 2 and was going to Agbara area of Ogun State. She was said to have given the conductor N500 and when she demanded for her balance, he said he had already given her and this resulted in an argument.

item.title: George Carlin - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Considered by many to be the greatest stand up comedian of all time, he put out 14 stand-up comedy specials for HBO in his career and was the first host of Saturday Night Live in 1975. He was posthumously awarded the Mark Twain Prize for American Humor in 2008. Before Fame He was court-martialed multiple times while working as a radar technician in the Air Force. He started his career in radio with Jack Burns, working for radio station KXOL in Fort Worth, Texas as comedy duo.

item.title: What Does Permanent Daylight Saving Time Mean as Senate Passes Bill?
item.description: The Senate Just Passed a Bill to Make Daylight Saving Time Permanent in the U.S.By Joseph AllenPublished March 16 2022, 10:38 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesEvery year, many people around the U.S. gripe and groan about setting the clocks forward and backward in order to account for the switch from Standard to Daylight Saving Time. item.title: FG Officially Declares October 1 As Public Holiday
item.description: The Federal Government of Nigeria has officially declared Thursday, October 1, 2020 as a public holiday to mark Nigeria’s 60th Independence Anniversary. This was made known by the Minister of Interior, Rauf Aregbesola in a statement on Tuesday which was signed by the Permanent Secretary of the Ministry of Interior, Georgina Ehuriah. The statement titled, ‘FG Declares Thursday, October 1, 2020, Public Holiday To Mark Nigeria’s 60th Independence Anniversary’ urged Nigerians to continue to aim for peace and unity which formed the bedrock Nigeria’s independence.

item.title: Four Chibok Girls Released From Boko Haram Captivity
item.description: Four Chibok girls have been released from the captivity of the Islamic State’s West Africa Province (ISWAP) fighters. Recall that the girls were part of the victims kidnapped during an invasion of Kautikari village of Chibok Local Government Area in Borno State on Friday, January 14. It was learned that the girls were taken to Dille village which shares a border with Sambisa forest before they were released on Sunday afternoon.

item.title: Mume asiyependa kuoga aachwa na mkewe siku chache baada ya harusi
item.description: -Jamaa mmoja kutoka eneo la Mwanyani aliadhibiwa na mke wake kwa kuachwa baada ya mkewe kulalamika kuwa jamaa huyo hapendi kuoga -Inadaiwa kuwa siku chache baada ya harusi, mkewe jamaa huyo alilalamikia harufu mbaya ya mumewe ambaye hakupenda kuoga -Baada ya kuachwa na mkewe, jamaa alibadili tabia yake na kuanza kuoga, akijitahidi kumrejesha mkewe nyumbani kwake Wakazi wa eneo la Mwanyani, Kikima walishangazwa na wapenzi wawili baada ya mke kudai kuwa mumewe ana uvundo mbaya na kuwa hapendi kuoga.

item.title: EFCC Must Probe Ex-president Goodluck Jonathan - Northern Group
item.description: Today.ng reports that some northern groups have called for an immediate investigation of the former president Goodluck Jonathan over allegations that he was involved in the shady $2 billion arms procurement deal. The groups believe the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) and other anti-graft agencies should pick up the former president after the arrest and questioning of people allegedly involved in the misappropriation of funds meant for the purchase of arms to strengthen the military in the fight against insurgency.

item.title: Gov Obiano Reveals His Successor
item.description: Prof Charles Soludo, a former Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) may become Anambra State’s next governor. The incumbent Governor, Willie Obiano, on Wednesday (today) vowed to make the economist his successor, Naija News reports. Speaking at the Anambra International Cargo and Passenger Airport at Umueri after his three-week vacation abroad, Governor Obiano said Soludo would succeed him when his tenure finally elapse. Naija News understands that Obiano today landed with a private jet at the airport exactly by 11:45 am and was received by Anambra lawmakers led by Speaker Uche Okafor.

item.title: Jamie Vardy - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Striker and winger who began his senior career with Stocksbridge Park Steels, scoring 66 goals in 107 appearances. In 2012, he began a career with Leicester City. Before Fame He was released by his first youth career team Sheffield Wednesday and developed with the Stocksbridge Park Steels.  Trivia He was awarded Fleetwood Town's Player of the Year honors in 2011-2012 and helped them win a Conference Premier title that year. Family Life He began dating Becky Nicholson and the couple welcomed a daughter named Sofia in 2014, a son named Finley in 2017, and a daughter named Olivia in 2020.

item.title: Pressure Mounts On PDP Chairman, Ayu To Resign
item.description: Some stakeholders of the Peoples Democratic Party have called on the National Chairman of the party, Iyorchia Ayu to resign from his position following the emergence of Former Vice President, Atiku Abubakar as the presidential candidate of the party. Atiku on Saturday defeated other presidential aspirants to emerge as the presidential candidate of the party in the 2023 race. Some stakeholders of the party in their reaction to the emergence of Atiku said based on the zoning arrangement of the party, both the national chairman and the presidential candidate cannot come from the same zone.

item.title: Super Falcons To Face South Africa In Women AFCON
item.description: Super Falcons have been drawn with their arch rivals, South Africa’s Bayana Bayana as the 2022 Women’s Africa Cup of Nations grouping was conducted in Rabat, Morocco on Friday night. When the competition was last held in Ghana in 2018, both teams were in the same group and also met in the final. Also drawn in the Group C are Burundi and Botswana. Hosts, Morocco are drawn in Group A against Burkina Faso, Senegal and Uganda  while in Group B are Cameroon, Zambia, Tunisia and Togo.

item.title: 21 Texts From Dad That Will Make You Laugh-Cry
item.description: 21 Texts From Dads That Will Make You Cry-LaughBy Cristina ManasUpdated Oct. 8 2018, 9:08 p.m. ET Source: redditDads. They’re notorious for their senses of humor—whether cheesy or savage, witty or groan-worthy, they never miss an opportunity to try and make us laugh. In fact, dads are such natural comedians they often crack us up without even meaning to. It should come as no surprise then, that when dads learn to text, hilarity ensues.

item.title: Gov. Wike Threatens To Sack Four First-Class Traditional Rulers In Rivers State (See List)
item.description: Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike has threatened to remove four first-class traditional rulers from office over alleged insubordination to the state government. Wike in his new year message to the residents of the state which was posted on his Facebook page on Saturday, accused the identified royal fathers of constantly failing to attend state functions. He added that should they continue to absent themselves from state functions and meetings of the Traditional Rulers Council, the government will be forced to remove them from office and replace them.

item.title: Joe Igbokwe Lists IPOB's Plan For South East (Full List)
item.description: The special adviser to the Lagos State Governor, Babajide Sanwo-Olu, Joe Igbokwe, has accused the Indigenous People of Biafra of sinking the South-East due to its actions. The All Progressives Congress chieftain in a post on his Facebook account further stated that IPOB is praised by residents of the region whenever they carry out an attack. Igbokwe accused the outlawed group of extorting money from marketers and residents so as not to attack their businesses and also stay away from trouble.

item.title: NDLEA Operatives Arrest Marlian Musicians Zinolesky And Mohbad [Video]
item.description: Operatives of the Nigerian Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) on Thursday morning stormed the residence of Marlian music artistes Mohbad and Zinolesky to arrest the duo. Naija News gathered that NDLEA officials allegedly broke into the residence of the musicians in the Lekki area of Lagos State, in the early hours of Thursday morning. The officials carried out the arrest without having any search warrants, manhandling the artistes signed to Marlian Music, eyewitnesses claimed.

item.title: Tobi Amusan Enters Final At World Athletics Championship
item.description: World 100-meter women’s hurdles champion and record holder, Tobi Amusan has proven to be unstoppable as she has qualified for the 100-meter hurdles final at the 2023 World Athletics Championship in Budapest, Hungary. Earlier today, August 23, Tobi Amusan won heat 2 by running an outstanding 12.56 seconds to ensure that she maintained her drive to defend her world title which she won in Oregon, the United States last year.

item.title: EFCC Accuses Saraki Of Blocking Investigation
item.description: The Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) has accused the former Senate President Bukola Saraki of hindering the agency from probing him. EFCC counsel, Chile Okoronkwo, made this known to Justice Anwuli Chikere of the Federal High Court, Abuja on Wednesday when the fundamental rights enforcement suits filed by the former Senate President were mentioned in the court. The EFCC had, in 2019, said it would probe Saraki’s earnings between 2003 and 2011 when he was governor of Kwara.

item.title: Nigerians Will Never Forget Buhari's Administration
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari‘s Special Adviser on Media and Publicity, Femi Adesina, said on Thursday that Nigerians would forever be grateful for the incumbent administration. The presidential aide said this in his latest publication, highlighting the projects done by his principal in the last seven years in government since he took over from the previous administration in 2015. In his renewed argument titled ” IN BUHARI’S TIME, OIL IS FINALLY FOUND IN THE NORTH,” Adesina said Buhari has so much love for the country and has had his name written in gold by continuing to work in the interest of Nigeria without paying attention to traducers.

item.title: Arshile Gorky - Trivia, Family, Bio

item.title: After Disappearing for 7 Years, Steven Stayner Suddenly Returned Home What Happened to Him?
item.description: When 7-year-old Steven Stayner didn't come home one day, it didn't take long for his mother to panic. Seven years later, he returned. So, what happened? Source: YouTube/ABC News (video still)The concept of the moral panic that is "stranger danger" didn't grip the United States until the 1980s. Around this time, pictures of missing children began showing up on milk cartons, which makes sense. People were drinking a lot of milk, and what better way to put the image of a missing child into the minds of Americans?

item.title: Supreme Court Affirms Adeleke As Osun PDP Governorship Candidate
item.description: The Supreme Court on Thursday affirmed Ademola Adeleke as the authentic governorship candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in Osun State. A governorship aspirant under PDP, Oyedotun Babayemi had dragged Adeleke before a Federal High Court seeking to be declared as the candidate of PDP. Babayemi had won the primary of the PDP faction held at the Children and Women Development Centre in Osogbo. Adeleke won the primary held at Osogbo City Stadium, which was backed by the PDP national working committee.

Those born under the Earth Dog sign have been known to use their emotional understanding to create timeless music. This has been the case for Michael Jackson and Prince, who were both born in 1958.

item.description: The Sun is your sign's planetary ruler and as you are born in the first Decan, or part, of the sign you have twice the Sun's influence. item.title: Four Women Claim To Be Six Year Old Boy's Mother, Panel Orders DNA Test
item.description: Four women are presently claiming to be the mother of a six-year-old boy that was abducted. An Independent Investigation Panel (IPP) set up by the federal government to look into the activities of the Special Anti-Robbery Squad (SARS) and other units of the police have therefore ordered a DNA test to verify the biological mother of the child identified as Elija Tanko. Justice Suleiman Galadima, the chairman of the panel being coordinated by the National Human Rights Commission (NHRC) said the DNA test will be carried out by an independent body to be employed by the commission.

item.title: We Formed Robbery Gang After SARS Was Disbanded
item.description: Operatives of the Ekiti State Police Command have apprehended 13 suspects who are connected to murder, armed robbery and rape in some parts of the state. The state police spokesperson, Sunday Abutu, revealed that the suspects confessed to forming their gang after the Special Anti-Robbery Squad (SARS) unit was Disbanded in October 2020. He further revealed that the suspects confessed to various crimes one of them being the murder of one POS operator, Francis Apata, at Ilawe-Ekiti in December 2021.

item.title: Peter Obi Breaks Ramadan Fast With Muslims At Abuja Mosque (Video)
item.description: The presidential candidate of the Labour Party (LP) in the 2023 election, Peter Obi, joined Muslims at the Central Mosque in Maraba-Nyanya in Abuja to participate in breaking the Ramadan fast. In a now-viral video shared on X (formerly Twitter), the former Governor of Anambra State sat beside a child on a mat while sharing a bowl of rice with the boy. The viral video also showed almost 1000 people at the mosque waiting to break their fast while others watched as the LP presidential candidate fed the child.

item.title: Frankie Manning - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Dancer and choreographer who popularized a Harlem-based type of jazz and swing dance called the "Lindy Hop." item.title: Malami Speaks On Resigning As AGF
item.description: The Minister of Justice and Attorney General of the Federation, Abubakar Malami, on Thursday reacted to the report of his alleged plan to resign from office. Malami in a statement released on Thursday charged Nigerians to be rest assured that he had no intention to resign as AGF. There had been reports that Malami has the intention of contesting in the governorship election in Kebbi State. A speculation which was denied by the Minister, adding that he is focus on discharging his duty.

item.title: Military Arrests Guinea President Alpha Conde, Dissolves Government [Photos]
item.description: An elite military unit have reportedly arrested Guinea President, Alpha Conde and dissolved the country’s government. Colonel Mamady Doumbouya of the Guinea military said in a video recorded in the capital Conakry that the National Assembly has been dissolved and the constitution suspended indefinitely. In a viral video, ousted President, Conde was seen being shoved into a van and driven away by security operatives. Residents had earlier disclosed that they heard about two hours of heavy gunfire across the capital, with two individuals seen with bullet wounds.

Aidha, wanafunzi kadhaa sawa na waalimu wao wamedhibitishwa kuugua maradhi hayo na hivyo kuweka wenzao katika hatari kubwa. Katibu katika wizara ya Elimu Zack Kinuthia alisema serikali itasaidia walioathirika katika kukabiliana na maambukizi hayo.

item.title: Abia Gov, Alex Otti Suspends All Permanent Secretaries, HoS
item.description: Abia State Governor, Alex Otti, has suspended all permanent secretaries across various ministries, agencies and departments. The development was confirmed in a statement made available to journalists on Thursday evening by the Chief Press Secretary to the Governor, Katie Oko. According to the statement, the Head of Service was also suspended. Governor Otti’s directive is coming against the backdrop of the inauguration of the Judicial Panel of Inquiry on the Recovery of Properties and Funds belonging to the Abia State Government, Naija News understands.

item.title: Buhari Issues Directive To APC Ahead Of National Convention
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has directed the National Caretaker and Extraordinary Convention Planning Committee of the All Progressives Congress (APC) to immediately prepare the schedule/timetable for the national convention. Recall that the Chairman of the Northern Governors Forum and Governor of Plateau State, Simon Lalong, had disclosed that the president would meet with APC governors on Sunday over the party’s national convention. Speaking with State House correspondents after a meeting with the president, Lalong said the leaders will discuss the convention slated for February and other matters affecting the party.

item.title: Trossard Stunned Anfield Crowd With Hatrick
item.description: Belgian’s Leandro Trossard on Saturday stunned Anfield crowd with a hatrick during an encounter between Liverpool and Brighton Albion. Four minutes into the game, Trossard gave Brighton the lead with a skilful move to the left of the penalty spot and a low shot across Alisson Becker. March’s cross would have made it 2-nil, but Alisson saved Welbeck’s header very close to the edge of the six-yard box. Liverpool’s Roberto Firmino got a chance and worked the space for the shot by seating two defenders down, but the effort was blocked.

Naija News recalls that Ezekwesili, while reacting to the demolition of some distressed structures in the Alaba International market, had urged Sanwo-Olu to publish details of each demolished building and the reasons they were removed. Ezekwesili insisted that doing this will show the general public that the exercise is not targeting the Igbos.

item.title: Real Madrid Vs Manchester City Ends In A Draw
item.description: Manchester City came from behind to pick a point at the Bernabeu to increase their chances of knocking out the reigning Champions League winners Real Madrid. Kevin de Bruyne’s 67th-minute goal has preserved Manchester City’s prospects of winning the Triple this season in a tense encounter between familiar foes. During the tense encounter, Thibaut Courtois made multiple stops to prevent De Bruyne, Rodri, and Erling Haaland from scoring more goals for coach Pep Guardiola who has never knocked out a Carlo Ancelotti’s team in the semi-finals of the Champions League.

Former Enugu SSG, Others Kidnapped
item.description: Unknown gunmen have kidnapped a Medical Doctor and a former Secretary to the Enugu State Government, Dr. Dan Shere. Naija News gathered that Shere was one of the several people abducted along the Enugu-Ugwuogo Nike-Nsukka Road on Thursday. Shere, who served under the administration of former Governor, Chimaroke Nnamani, was on his way to Nsukka for a meeting when the gunmen attacked him alongside other travellers. However one of the survivors, who shared a video of the attack, said the gunmen were about eight in number.

item.title: Peyton Manning - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Super Bowl XLI MVP with the Indianapolis Colts who set the all-time NFL records for most career passing yards and most career passing touchdowns. He was selected first overall by the Colts in 1998 and spent his first 14 NFL seasons in Indianapolis before signing with the Denver Broncos in 2012. He helped the Broncos win Super Bowl 50 in 2016.  Before Fame He was named Gatorade's National Player of the Year while starring at New Orleans Newman High School in Louisiana.

item.title: What Peter Obi Said After Emerging Labour Party Presidential Candidate [Full Text]
item.description: Former Anambra State Governor, Peter Obi, on Monday officially became the presidential candidate of the Labour Party. Obi will battle former Vice President Atiku Abubakar of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) for Nigeria’s presidency. In his acceptance speech after emerging as Labour Party (LP) candidate, Obi said Nigeria has become a laughing stock among other nations, including African countries where we were once revered. According to him, the battle to retake Nigerian seems insurmountable, but with commitment, patriotism and understanding it is achievable.

item.title: Stop Saying The Country Will Be Better, Those In Power Are Selfish, Self-Centred
item.description: The National Secretary of the Coalition of United Political Parties (CUPP), Peter Ameh, has called on Nigerians to challenge the government over the security and economic challenges in the country. He insisted that the ability of the people to protest bad leadership is what keeps those in government responsible and responsive. Ameh shared his reservations about the state of the economy during an interview with Punch. He insisted that it was time for Nigerians to stop being docile.
